parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To measure (out), estimate. From metron; to measure; by implication, to admeasure.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A wall, especially of a city. Akin to the base of tikto; a wall.
One hundred. Of uncertain affinity; a hundred.
A cubit, about a foot and a half. Of uncertain affinity; the fore-arm, i.e. a cubit.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
An apparently primary word; a measure, literally or figuratively; by implication, a limited portion.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
